//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float2 DecalBlendInterval;
//   float3 DecalLocalNormal;
//   float2 DecalNearFarPlaneDistance;
//   sampler2D HeightmapTexture;
//   float4 MinZ_MaxZRatio;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_0;
//   sampler2D SceneColorTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   float4 UniformPixelScalars_0;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_1;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                      Reg   Size
//   ------------------------- ----- ----
//   DNEResolution             c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias   c1       1
//   MinZ_MaxZRatio            c2       1
//   NvStereoEnabled           c3       1
//   DecalNearFarPlaneDistance c7       1
//   UniformPixelVector_0      c8       1
//   UniformPixelVector_1      c9       1
//   UniformPixelScalars_0     c10      1
//   DecalLocalNormal          c11      1
//   DecalBlendInterval        c12      1
//   SceneColorTexture         s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture        s1       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0          s2       1
//   HeightmapTexture          s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 2, -1, 1, 0.5
    def c5, 0.00100000005, 0.949999988, 0.0500000007, 0
    def c6, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c13, 0.400000006, 3, 5, 0
    dcl_texcoord4 v0.w
    dcl_texcoord5 v1.w
    dcl_texcoord v2.xy
    dcl_texcoord1 v3.xyw
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --quiet CRC32_F47C41C2_281.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    texld r0, v2, s3
    mad r0.xy, r0.zwzw, c4.x, c4.y
    dp2add r0.w, r0, -r0, c4.z
    rsq r0.w, r0.w
    rcp r0.z, r0.w
    add r0.w, -c12.x, c12.y
    add r1.x, c12.x, c12.y
    mul r1.x, r1.x, c4.w
    nrm r2.xyz, r0
    dp3 r0.x, c11, r2
    rcp r0.y, r0.w
    mul r0.z, r0.y, r1.x
    mad r0.x, r0.x, r0.y, -r0.z
    add_sat r0.x, r0.x, c4.w
    mad r0.yz, vPos.xxyw, c0.xxyw, c0.xzww
    mul r1.xy, r0.yzzw, v1.w
    add r0.yz, c4.z, -v3.xxyw
    mul r2.xy, r0.yzzw, v3
    add r0.y, -c7.x, v3.w
    add r2.z, r0.y, c5.x
    add r0.y, c7.y, -v3.w
    add r2.w, r0.y, c5.x
    texkill r2
    texld r2, v3, s2
    mov r0.yz, c5
    mad r0.y, c10.w, r0.y, r0.z
    add r0.y, -r0.y, r2.x
    frc r0.z, -r0.y
    add_sat r0.y, r0.z, r0.y
    abs r0.z, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r2, c6, s1
      add r0.w, -r2.y, v1.w
      mad r1.z, r2.x, r0.w, r1.x
      mov r1.w, v1.w
      mov r2.xyz, r1.zyww
    else
      mov r2.xyz, c5.w
    endif
    mov r1.z, v1.w
    cmp r1.xyz, -r0.z, r1, r2
    rcp r0.z, r1.z
    mul r0.zw, r0.z, r1.xyxy
    mad r1.xy, r0.zwzw, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r1.zw, c5.w
    texldl r1, r1, s0
    add r0.z, r1.w, -c2.y
    add r0.w, -r0.z, c6.z
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    cmp r0.z, r0.w, c6.w, r0.z
    mad r0.z, c2.x, r0.z, -v1.w
    mul_sat r0.z, r0.z, c13.x
    add r0.z, -r0.z, c4.z
    mul_sat r0.z, r0.z, c13.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r0.z
    mov r1.y, c4.y
    add r1.xyz, r1.y, c9
    mad r0.yzw, r0.y, r1.xxyz, c8.xxyz
    add r1.x, c7.y, -v3_abs.w
    mul r1.x, r1.x, c13.z
    rcp r1.y, c7.y
    mul_sat r1.x, r1.y, r1.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, r1.x
    mul r0.xyz, r0.yzww, r0.x
    mul r0.w, v0.w, v0.w
    mad_pp oC0.xyz, r0.w, r0, c4.z
    mov_pp oC0.w, c4.z

// approximately 73 instruction slots used (5 texture, 68 arithmetic)
